jmud
Class RoomExit

java.lang.Object
  jmud.RoomExit

public class RoomExit
extends java.lang.Object

Represents an exit from a room. This class contains information about a room exit. This includes the exit's label (such as "north" or "glowing portal"), its destination, and any restrictions on usage (such as level requirement or keys needed).

Author:
Will Pall

Constructor Summary
RoomExit(java.lang.String label, int destinationId)
          Constructs a room exit with the given label and destination given by the destination room's id.

          Constructs a room exit with the given label and destination.
